description: A string management platform for key-based translations, enabling the localization of digital products at scale.

core_features.name: String Management
core_features.description: Extracts segments from code repositories or design files to manage the entire translation process.

core_features.name: Automation
core_features.description: Automates routine steps in the localization process, reducing manual effort.

core_features.name: Collaboration
core_features.description: Facilitates collaboration among global teams, ensuring consistent translations.

core_features.name: Over-the-Air Updates
core_features.description: Deploys translations instantly to apps and websites, ensuring timely updates.

core_features.name: Translation Memory & Glossary
core_features.description: Reuses existing translations to maintain consistency across projects.

analytics.description: Provides insights into translation activities and performance metrics.
